reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 786/91: EGGS - EXTENSION OF POWERS OF THE CANADIAN EGG MARKETING AGENCY
reg_info.reg_name_text: EGGS — EXTENSION OF POWERS OF THE CANADIAN EGG MARKETING AGENCY
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 786/91: EGGS - EXTENSION OF POWERS OF THE CANADIAN EGG MARKETING AGENCY

content.content: 1. In this Regulation,  “eggs” means eggs of a domestic hen produced in Ontario other than hatching eggs.  O. Reg. 786/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“eggs” means eggs of a domestic hen produced in Ontario other than hatching eggs.  O. Reg. 786/91, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The Lieutenant Governor in Council grants to the Canadian Egg Marketing Agency constituted under the Farm Products Marketing Agencies Act (Canada) authority to regulate the marketing within Ontario of eggs and, for that purpose, to exercise the powers that it may exercise with respect to eggs marketed in interprovincial or export trade under paragraphs 22 (1) (d), (j), (k) and (m) of that Act.  O. Reg. 786/91, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The Lieutenant Governor in Council grants to the Canadian Egg Marketing Agency constituted under the Farm Products Marketing Agencies Act (Canada) authority to regulate the marketing within Ontario of eggs and, for that purpose, to exercise the powers that it may exercise with respect to eggs marketed in interprovincial or export trade under paragraphs 22 (1) (d), (j), (k) and (m) of that Act.  O. Reg. 786/91, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 786/91, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 786/91, s. 3.
